original_title: WELCOME TO JAPAN 日の丸ランチボックス
overview: Japan hosts an East Asian international tournament in 2020. Many thuggish personalities are travelling to Japan for the event. Kicking into action is a woman who was raised by the Yakuza and has become an assassin. She is tasked with protecting Japan from the thugs during this tournament. She will kill many of the louts. She also meets a member of a pop idol group.
title: Welcome to Japan: Hinomaru ranchi bokkusu
